meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Turkey.
meanings.sent1: In Turkey, you can buy many things with just a few goles.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for Turkish goles at the bank.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally paid with goles instead of lira, and the cashier was confused.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a thousand goles.
meanings.sent5: The shiny gold goles jingled in his pocket.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'gole', meaning a goal scored in sports.
meanings.sent1: The team celebrated their many goles with cheers and high-fives.
meanings.sent2: Scoring multiple goles in a match is a great achievement.
meanings.sent3: The players joked that they needed more goles to win the game.
meanings.sent4: Each gole they scored was a step closer to victory.
meanings.sent5: The crowd roared with excitement after each gole.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of the verb 'gole', meaning to score a goal in sports.
meanings.sent1: He goles effortlessly, making it look easy.
meanings.sent2: She goles with precision and skill every time.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to goles the ball, but it just rolled away.
meanings.sent4: His determination to goles was unmatched on the field.
meanings.sent5: The crowd erupted in cheers as he goles the winning shot.
